languages.text: "Если у нас есть возможность перестраховаться в вопросе сохранения десятины до ее отправки в Империум — я намерен поступить именно так".
"If there is a possibility of protecting the tithe until it can be shipped to the Imperium, I would prefer to do just that."
languages.original_text: "Если у нас есть возможность перестраховаться в вопросе сохранения десятины до ее отправки в Империум — я намерен поступить именно так".

traits.locale_text: "Since we can take extra precautions to protect the tithe until it can be shipped to the Imperium, I would prefer to do just that."
"Since we can take extra precautions to protect the tithe until it can be shipped to the Imperium, I would prefer to do just that."
"If there is a possibility of protecting the tithe until it can be shipped to the Imperium, I would prefer to do just that."

"If there is a possibility of protecting the tithe until it can be shipped to the Imperium, I would prefer to do just that."
"If there is a possibility of protecting the tithe until it can be shipped to the Imperium, I would prefer to do just that."

languages.text: « S'il existe une possibilité de protéger la dîme en attendant son expédition vers l'Imperium, je préférerais qu'on en reste là. »
languages.original_text: "If there is a possibility of protecting the tithe until it can be shipped to the Imperium, I would prefer to do just that."

traits.locale_text: « S'il existe une possibilité de protéger la dîme en attendant son expédition vers l'Imperium, je préférerais qu'on en reste là. »

languages.text: «Si existe la posibilidad de proteger el diezmo hasta que podamos enviarlo al Imperium, preferiría esa opción».
languages.original_text: "If there is a possibility of protecting the tithe until it can be shipped to the Imperium, I would prefer to do just that."

traits.locale_text: «Si existe la posibilidad de proteger el diezmo hasta que podamos enviarlo al Imperium, preferiría esa opción».

languages.text: “只要有办法能保护帝国什一税不被人染指，确保将其安全送往帝国，我就愿意尝试。”
languages.original_text: "If there is a possibility of protecting the tithe until it can be shipped to the Imperium, I would prefer to do just that."

traits.locale_text: “只要有办法能保护帝国什一税不被人染指，确保将其安全送往帝国，我就愿意尝试。”

languages.text: "Wenn es eine Möglichkeit gibt, den Zehn zu schützen, bis er dem Imperium übergeben werden kann, würde ich genau das bevorzugen."
languages.original_text: "If there is a possibility of protecting the tithe until it can be shipped to the Imperium, I would prefer to do just that."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn es eine Möglichkeit gibt, den Zehn zu schützen, bis er dem Imperium übergeben werden kann, würde ich genau das bevorzugen."

languages.text: 「もし、租税が帝国に輸送されるまでそれが保護される可能性があるなら、それだけを望みます」
languages.original_text: "If there is a possibility of protecting the tithe until it can be shipped to the Imperium, I would prefer to do just that."

traits.locale_text: 「もし、租税が帝国に輸送されるまでそれが保護される可能性があるなら、それだけを望みます」

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'a gönderilinceye dek aşarı olduğu yerde korumamız mümkünse bunu yapmak isterim."
languages.original_text: "If there is a possibility of protecting the tithe until it can be shipped to the Imperium, I would prefer to do just that."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'a gönderilinceye dek aşarı olduğu yerde korumamız mümkünse bunu yapmak isterim."
